title: What the hell what is going on? XD every Game both midlaners have smite?
body:
What the hell, what happened? I just played three games today and I seen both mid with smite, and then I thought they were dumb or something, until i Saw the enemy team TAKING ALL MY FUCKING JUNGLE AND LETTING 0 SCUTTLE CRABS? HOE IM SUPPOSED TO LEVEL UP WHEN I GOT AN ENTIRE TEAM TAKING MY XP? CAN SOMEONE EXPLAIN ME WHAT HAPPENED IN THIS WEEK THAT I DIDNT PLAY?
I'm nota talking about low elo
IM TALKING ABOUT PLAT-DIAMOND MIDLANERS DOING THIS IN MY GAMES, ???!??!!!?¿?¿

Edit: I just readed the patch, the XP the Camps give now just stupid, like, they took off the 30% of the XP THAT Camps gives u..
And putting a scuttle crab THAT decides your FUCKING ENTIRE EARLY GAME BY WICH MIDLANER HAVE SMITE, OR WICH TOPLANER COME FASTER? U SERIOUS? MAKING THIS GAME, EVEN WORSE TO CARRY AS A SOLO PLAYER?
Sorry, god damit, i just backed to play some league and found this, i have no words, i played only jungle and adc since season 4, i'm spechless, they just nerfed jungle too hard, i dont know the reason.

replies.body: Welcome to league of scuttle.
WELCOME TO PATCH 8.10 FELLOW JUNGLER

> [{quoted}](name=Battalion,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cMq8Tb6V,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-05-19T02:25:17.571+0000)
>
> What a time to be alive. 
> 
> 
> ....kill me now.
> 
> {{champion:203}}

Man i surely do love my self getting gangbanged at every scuttle, aspecially since it also tells where im at :^)
Solution? Make jungle give -75% xp to those without jungling items.

> [{quoted}](name=Bhagswag,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cMq8Tb6V,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-05-18T09:36:52.294+0000)
>
> Solution? Make jungle give -75% xp to those without jungling items.

Not really a solution, people will just buy the jungle item
I would love to go up against a midlaner with smith and a jungle item
You mean the fact that every mage that goes smite is buying Runic Echoes after their DRing?
That sounds horrible
memories of runeglaive ezreal UwU

> [{quoted}](name=Malix Farwin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cMq8Tb6V,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2018-05-18T09:45:13.792+0000)
>
> Not really a solution, people will just buy the jungle item
>

It's still a load of gold lol
i already do and so do many others

Patch 8.10: {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}}  vs {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}}

One big ... party.
Scuttle giving nearly 200g happened. I am at a loss for words really. How did riot NOT see this coming.

Because they're blinded by pride and don't want to hear people who have issues with their game direction.  Ironic considering how as they continue to revert awful changes, it's beginning to bring people back, and the reverts (for the most part) are met with praise and thanks.  I mean, the only reason I'm even back is because they _**almost**_ fixed Ahri after 3 seasons of her being forced to play as a bitch-mode kiter. 

Makes you wonder doesn't it?  Like maybe if they had listened to the warnings and alarms the first, second, or desperately begged third time, things wouldn't be so bad in season ~~6~~ ~~7~~ 8...but what do I know? Devs with common sense and foresight? Get outta 'ere!

Revert this, or just get rid of the crab and let us buy wards again.

CRAB BATTLE
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/252606428659974144/446755335084965890/getthatcrab.png

> [{quoted}](name=Maiev,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cMq8Tb6V,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2018-05-18T19:33:29.391+0000)
>
> CRAB BATTLE
> https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/252606428659974144/446755335084965890/getthatcrab.png

That's Lord Baron Scuttle Crab
[https://imgur.com/8PcqTgm](https://imgur.com/8PcqTgm)
artwork
Cry less GET OVER IT. Best fucking change riot has implimented. I fucking love this change as a Mid laner. Was needed... time for a meta shift and for junglers to get some pressure for once.

> [{quoted}](name=Evalion,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cMq8Tb6V,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2018-05-18T17:54:49.394+0000)
>
> Cry less GET OVER IT. Best fucking change riot has implimented. I fucking love this change as a Mid laner. Was needed... **time for a meta shift and for junglers to get some pressure for once.
**

The bolded part completely contradicts the first half of the statement. Judging by your recent posts you would be better off in single player games or vs bots as this game is more chess like where you have to think.
Me jungle me think me camp top or bot. hard decision me big brain me playing chess me high IQ jungle player.

> [{quoted}](name=Evalion,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cMq8Tb6V,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2018-05-18T17:54:49.394+0000)
>
> Cry less GET OVER IT. Best fucking change riot has implimented. I fucking love this change as a Mid laner. Was needed... time for a meta shift and for junglers to get some pressure for once.

this is why you dont have friends or in a relationship mate
Oh just riot pushing changes regardless of feedback again. Nbd.

I know right? I used to play jungle some but I refuse now.  I don't want to be forced to fight the enemy jungler at level 2 to decide the outcome of my entire "laning" phase. It's honestly ridiculous. But hey, I guess level 2 jungler fights are more flashy for LC$.

The boards are at fault for the jungle changes.

They did not specify what they wanted majority of the time; they wanted the jungle changed and Riot followed through and listened to the community. It isn't Riot 's fault, but the boards instead.
It's besides the fact that the boards were flooded with posts about how much of a bad idea these changes were when they were announced, right?

> [{quoted}](name=OctaGunslinger,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cMq8Tb6V,comment-id=000a0001,timestamp=2018-05-18T23:06:32.038+0000)
>
> It's besides the fact that the boards were flooded with posts about how much of a bad idea these changes were when they were announced, right?

When the plants were shown 99% of people hated them.

I saw a poll like 2 months ago saying 75% of people liked them.

Its almost like people tend to have crazy knee jerk reactions and their initial feelings cant be trusted.

> [{quoted}](name=Colton147,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cMq8Tb6V,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2018-05-18T18:15:43.961+0000)
>
> The boards are at fault for the jungle changes.
> 
> They did not specify what they wanted majority of the time; they wanted the jungle changed and Riot followed through and listened to the community. It isn't Riot 's fault, but the boards instead.
>

I like this viewpoint. I mean forget that 15 posts in the last 2 weeks about Malzahar needing a change, how midlane mages are being made pointless, lets go for the jungle instead! No dude sorry, they AREN'T listening.
Wow did my "Idgaf what you say I'm taking smite mid lane because everyone keeps taking my CS after first tower" post actually make an impression or something?
well i try to avoid playing jungle until they fix this

Heres the problem with the change. Way back in the day Dragons used to give 300 gold to your entire team and it was considered extremely powerful. Scuttle gives near that much with less effort and makes you really powerful in lane without actually having to kill anyone.

> [{quoted}](name=Destrucxiong,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cMq8Tb6V,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-05-18T04:09:59.084+0000)
>
> What the hell, what happened? I just played three games today and I seen both mid with smite, and then I thought they were dumb or something, until i Saw the enemy team TAKING ALL MY FUCKING JUNGLE AND LETTING 0 SCUTTLE CRABS? HOE IM SUPPOSED TO LEVEL UP WHEN I GOT AN ENTIRE TEAM TAKING MY XP? CAN SOMEONE EXPLAIN ME WHAT HAPPENED IN THIS WEEK THAT I DIDNT PLAY?

Here is a guide for you to better under how to play JG in patch 8.10 [https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/3K6Aiktu-810-jungle-guide-on-how-to-play-the-jungle
](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/3K6Aiktu-810-jungle-guide-on-how-to-play-the-jungle)
